job_tasks.phrase: Modellen die voorspellen welke advertentie banner/creative het meest geschikt is voor een online bezoeker
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to building predictive models, which is a core aspect of the Modeling task category.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor most likely converters/clickers van advertentie campagnes
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the development of predictive models to identify likely converters or clickers, aligning with the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor het voorspellen van leeftijd en gender van DPG Media online bezoekers obv geconsumeerde content
job_tasks.justification: This refers to building predictive models to estimate user demographics based on content consumption, a clear example of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Toevoegen van profile enrichments in batch & real-time flows in een big data environment
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of adding data enrichments within data flows, which falls under Data Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines & dashboards voor quality monitoring & alerting
job_tasks.justification: The creation of data pipelines for monitoring and alerting is a key responsibility within Data Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt mee aan onze web applicaties
job_tasks.justification: This clearly indicates involvement in building web applications, which is part of Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: This encompasses requirements analysis, experimentation, implementation, and presentation of results, all fundamental to the Software Development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt mee aan onze onderliggende data stack & data pipelines
job_tasks.justification: Building the data stack and data pipelines is a direct responsibility within Data Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: you build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, …)
job_tasks.justification: The 'you build it, you run it' mentality, coupled with mentions of devops, infra-as-code, and CICD, points directly to Operations Engineering (MLOps).

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt samen met de Data & ML engineers ons ML Ops platform uit
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly building out an ML Ops platform is a core component of Operations Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: je integreert onze services met andere DPG teams die van onze data services gebruik maken
job_tasks.justification: Integrating services with other teams is a software development task focused on system interoperability.

job_tasks.phrase: In de rol van ML Engineer ben je verantwoordelijk voor het end-to-end implementeren van ML modellen binnen het domein van digital advertising.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase establishes the business domain (digital advertising) and the end-to-end implementation of ML models, indicating a need to understand the business context.

job_tasks.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: Presenting results to the business team indicates the need to translate technical findings into business-relevant terms and understand business needs.

soft_skills.phrase: experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters
je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
you build it, you run it mentaliteit

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and implementing predictive models for digital advertising, including tasks like data pipelines and quality monitoring. While there's some overlap with software development and MLOps, the core focus is on model creation and deployment in a production environment, aligning with the definition of an ML Engineer.
